title: Ok riot sound team, you kick complete ass with the work you do
body:
This login man, pat yourselves on the back riot sound/music department, you deserve the highest of fives.
https://45.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5rf8bceiU1r9epbqo1_500.gif

replies.body: {{champion:11}} _Let them fight._
I lol'd

I'VE BEEN WITNESSED.
http://33.media.tumblr.com/18de49ab9b54f88b36822a4927b5ce60/tumblr_nr86c7u0pg1ru8eoyo1_500.gif
Haha! I'm an Aussie too so this is just perfect.  You will ride eternal, shiny and chrome.
**I LIVE, I DIE, I LIVE AGAIN!**
ARE YOU REALLY?

I am! I'm from Melbourne. I still have the account RIotKindlejack on OCE and I play the occasional ARAM (ping is too high for a serious game). I'm also really hoping to be able to go to PAX Aus this year and share some stories about my experiences, but no promises right now.
Please reconsider the chinese splash for like Fiora and blitz and amumu and so many others, idk who to ask but pleaaseee):
Well mecha {{champion:121}}  was bugged so he doesn't appear in the splash, and Rito just forgot {{champion:266}}  existed again

> [{quoted}](name=SpaghettiTime,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=fs6kUzhJ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-03-26T14:14:52.463+0000)
>
> Well mecha {{champion:121}}  was bugged so he doesn't appear in the splash, and Rito just forgot {{champion:266}}  existed again

Note that the only two in the splash are the tanks. The others are closer to assassins. So this is like the battle of armor vs health. Who will win? Will they just remain clashed like that forever? Can they free themselves? Do they want to? Are they wrestling for fun or dominance? Are they even capable of out-damage their respective health regens? All good questions.
wish i knew where mecha {{champion:266}} is in all this....

Jerking off somewhere else with mecha {{champion:121}} 
{{summoner:31}}
That put a terrible image in my mind.
You know they hire independent people for music?
But a rioter writes the music. The orchestra is hired, yes.
What I really like about the music is that it does have these moments where it sounds like a train is arriving,which is really fitting considering that mecha-zero sion can transform into one.

Yet another reason for me to buy the skin, although the file n the PBE a week ago was reason enough. Riot, you have successfully made me more hyped for this skin than i have ever been for anything ever. I, _i need a moment_.

https://media.giphy.com/media/12x1yAryHzxWuc/giphy.gif

The hype train gives no moment
{{champion:14}} Toot Toot
Man I want to kno who was on the team that made the animated splash, its amazingly awesomely beautifully detailed

*Cheers on Malphite*

;-; It's like watching Gamera all over again.

OMG, so, i've had the song on repeat for hours. I really love that it sounds like something out of Pacific Rim but isn't a rip off the orginal melody, and that I hear transformer-esc riffs throughout the song.  Such a good blend.

the strong brumbeats + deep bass make the song sound really powerful

just

omgggggggggggggggggggggggg

Yeah, I totally agree. Sound and art have been kicking major ass at Riot. Highest of Fives for them all. Easily the best part of LoL for me right now.

I mean at that, and listen to that! It's like Omega Supreme and Trypticon are going at it again. We have our mechs all we need now is our sea monsters.
Sion and Malphite giving each other a fist bump about epicly fucking awesome this login is.
These guys are based of the Jaegers from Pacific Rim, right? (sorry for spelling)

Looks more like Omega Supreme vs Trypticon to me.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tHQ_TV-ccZk/hqdefault.jpg

http://img00.deviantart.net/094b/i/2012/015/a/3/omega_vs_trypticon_by_markthomasboom-d4mcozs.png

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/warforcybertron/images/8/84/Omega_rockets.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110411105947
Yeah, but Sion is a Gobot
oh yess

Is it just me or does it seem like some of the legendaries released are totally awesome (Omega Squad Teeto, Mecha Sion), while others seem rushed out and cash-grabby (Dragon Trainer Tristana)

Like, I only saw the Dragon Trainer Tristana login screen maybe twice and I didn't really care both times.

> [{quoted}](name=Bladerunner7777,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=fs6kUzhJ,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-03-26T20:27:21.470+0000)
>
> Is it just me or does it seem like some of the legendaries released are totally awesome (Omega Squad Teeto, Mecha Sion), while others seem rushed out and cash-grabby (Dragon Trainer Tristana)
> 
> Like, I only saw the Dragon Trainer Tristana login screen maybe twice and I didn't really care both times.

Don't forget Battlecast Skarner. That thing was half-baked.
Meh, Could have been better. That style doesn't appeal to me anyway.
